description.value:
Wondrous Item, Uncommon
You must crack this seed and throw it—greater skill gains greater results. Make a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check and consult the table below. The creature that appears serves you as a knight and steed for a week and a day. If you are already a titled knight, the creature and steed serve as a squire.
CheckResult
10 or less@UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.KyVY9u2LePlCcKDB]{Knight} with @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.T1xZTDCGuvMBSq8d]{warhorse}
11–15@UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressmonsters.Actor.KPgreenknightoft]{Green knight of the woods} with warhorse
16–19@UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressmonsters.Actor.KPwyvernknight00]{Wyvern knight} with @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressmonsters.Actor.KPwarwyvern00000]{war wyvern}
20+@UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressmonsters.Actor.KPinfernalknight]{Infernal knight} (devil) on @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.Ud4a8hMgKHtjSSde]{nightmare}
